Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Karlov
ShortDescription: Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Pulaski, 59th and Midway, due to street blockage near 63rd/Karlov.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Pulaski, 59th and Midway, due to street blockage near 63rd/Karlov.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
